name_for_human: Rachel Sharp - Science Communicator & Neuroscience Researcher
description_for_model: Portfolio website for Rachel Sharp, a neuroscience PhD candidate and science communicator. Contains research publications, science writing samples, CV, and contact information. Specializes in computational genomics, neuropsychiatric disorders, and making complex science accessible.
description_for_human: Rachel Sharp's portfolio showcasing neuroscience research and science communication work
